Jargon Term: You should eat a diet high in fiber.

Jargon Term: Follow up with your PCP as scheduled below.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - PCP appointment

Jargon Term: If you develop rectal bleeding, abdominal pain, nausea/vomiting, fevers/chills, chest pain, trouble breathing or any other symptoms that concern you please call your doctor or go to the emergency room.
